document_data.mainbody:
Brassune, Akan没l
Queen Cyndra was a windsoul genasi and the ruler of Akan没l in the early years of the 15 century DR.
Cyndra was the daughter of Zavon, and she was also the mother of Arathane, who she bore late in life.
Cyndra was considered a fair and just ruler by her subjects, and was well liked by both the nobility and the commoners of Akan没l.
Around the , Cyndra became queen of Akan没l after succeeding her father, the late King Zavon. Cyndra led the survivors of Brassune to the city of Airspur, displacing its orc and half-orc inhabitants, and rebuilding the city into the new home of the displaced genasi. Cyndra also enacted laws and edicts that gained her the approval and support of the nobility, such as the Covenant of Stewardship and the office of the Four Stewards. It was considered that her rule was a renaissance of sorts for the genasi kingdom.
Queen Cyndra died of illness in 1469 DR, and was succeeded as queen by her daughter, Arathane.
